title: doc/gdb: suggest `ldflags -S` will strip debug info.
body:
by **antoinegrondin**: 
In the intro of http://golang.org/doc/gdb:

> Pass the '-s' flag to the linker to omit the debug information (for example, go
build -ldflags "-s" prog.go).

Apparently this is no longer true from
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d5f023ae1d0e.
